item.title: Monthly Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Panel
item.description: Just a brief note. For my dissertation, I needed to create a monthly panel of militarized interstate dispute (MID) data, which proved to be more difficult than initially anticipated. To “be kind to my future self,” I wrote up what I did on a gist, and I’ll also copy the code below. If you find yourself in a similar situation, I hope this helps! # Code to create a monthly, directed dyadic panel of # Militarized Interstate Dispute data, with directional initiation # uses cshapes to create monthly list of all dyads, then uses data.
